name: Backpackers Central Hamilton
description:
Backpackers Central Hamilton is located in the heart of Hamiltons CBD on the main street. 6 minutes of walking away from Hamilton Transport Centre. Modern, safe (24-hour access with electronic swipe key), clean and affordable. 

We know backpackers well so have everything they need. High-speed unlimited WiFi, free big lockers, free car park, well-appointed kitchens, guest laundry, etc. Our backpackers' central team is always ready to provide personalized service should you need anything at all.
Your satisfaction is our goal, Arrive as guests and leave as friends!

Cancellation must be made a full 48 hours prior to the arrival date.
Charge the first night when a guest cancel a booking within 48 hours of arrival 

Please note that parking is on a first come first serve basis.

No refund will be given after arrival should you alter your reserved dates or leave for any reason before your reserved departure date. We offer a free accommodation voucher for canceled nights.  
Group booking requires a 10 % deposit (Non-refundable) to confirm a reservation 
Full amount payments are needed 7 days before the arrival dates for group booking 
We can't accept booking modification 5 days before check-in or after full payment.
Different terms & conditions may apply on special occasions. 

Request $20 or your ID for a key deposit when you check in. We will return your key deposit when you check out.
The parking is first come first served but there is plenty of parking available
We reserve the right to make a charge to the guest’s credit card
No drugs, smoking, and alcohol permitted on-site
Some rooms have no windows

Thank you so much.

groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
- For a full refund, cancellation must be made 48 hours prior to the arrival date.
- Charge the first night when a guest cancels a booking within 48 hours of arrival. 
- Do refund via bank transfer or to credit card and refund transaction fees must be paid by customers. 
- A deposit can be charged prior to your arrival. 
- No refund will be given after arrival should you alter your reserved dates or leave for any reason before your reserved departure date. We offer a free accommodation voucher for canceled nights.  
- Group booking requires 10 % deposit (Non-refundable) to confirm a reservation and $200 bond is required for damages and will be refunded upon departure into a nominated bank account provided.
- Full amount of payments must be paid 7 days before the arrival date for group booking.
- We can't accept booking modification 5 days before check-in or after full payment for group booking.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
- No Cash payment policy. Please pay by your debit or credit card in principle. 
- Our check-in time is between 2 pm and  9 pm, After 9 pm, late check-in must be prearranged before arrival. 
- Request your photo ID and $10 for a key deposit on arrival. We will return your key deposit on check-out.
- The parking is first to come first serve basis and need to get the parking pass at the reception. 
- We reserve the right to make a charge to the guest’s credit card. 
If a booking is made with an invalid credit card, we may cancel your reservation without notice. 
- No drugs and alcohol permitted on-site.
- The hostel does not allow the presence of animals.
- Guests responsible for fire alarm activation will be responsible for the fines and fees applied by the local Fire department and services
- In case of violation of the regulations, the hostel reserves the right to remove the guest from the hostel for good - without any refunds given.
- All guests under the age of 18 must be accompanied by a responsible adult who has parental rights and responsibilities for the under 18-year-old guest.
